page.title: 36Health Services
page.content:
There are no GP surgeries or dental practices based within the area, the nearest services are in Knaresborough where villagers are cared for.The nearest hospital is Harrogate District Hospital also providing out of hours GP services via NHS direct. Emergencies attend by Paramedics through 999 ambulance calls.

The Children's Public Health Nursing Team based in Knaresborough covers the health needs of children between 0-19 years. Children have their height and weight measurements taken at school in Reception and Year 6 as part of the National Child Measurement Programme. Year 1 children have a hearing screening test.

Health Visitors see new mothers and babies in their home.

District Nursing Teams visit patients with health needs in the home.

Specialist community health services have been developed including cardiac and respiratory teams and palliative care to meet health needs at home.
W. Towers (Public Health Nursing Team)
